tool_description: Creates comprehensive audit logs for refund transactions to ensure compliance and traceability.

transaction_id.description: Unique identifier for the refund transaction

user_id.description: ID of the user who processed the refund

action_type.description: Type of action performed (refund_processed, inventory_adjusted, account_updated)

system_module.description: System module that initiated the action

data_before.description: JSON string of data state before the action

data_after.description: JSON string of data state after the action

ip_address.description: IP address of the user who performed the action

error_messages: Invalid transaction ID: Transaction ID format is incorrect or not found.
User not found: User ID does not exist in the system.
Invalid action type: Action type must be a recognized system action.
JSON parsing error: data_before or data_after contains invalid JSON format.
Audit log creation failed: Unable to create audit record due to system error.
usage: Provide transaction_id, user_id, action_type, and system_module to create an audit trail entry for the refund transaction.

audit_log_id.description: Unique identifier for the created audit log entry

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the audit log was created

compliance_status.description: Compliance validation status for the audit entry
